=== Current Issues ===

Microphone-in does not work. However integrated microphone does work.

Also needed to add the following to `/etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base`:

<pre>
options snd-hda-intel model=dell-5stack
</pre>

=== Testing for Ubuntu 8.04 (Hardy) 32bit ISO ===

Normal installer fails. After this I moved on to testing the Alternate Text Mode installer.

=== Testing for Ubuntu 8.04 (Hardy) Alternate Text Mode 32bit ISO ===

===== Does X start correctly? =====

Yes.

===== Is X running at the correct resolution? =====

Yes.

===== Does the restricted driver work? =====

Yes.

===== Does glxinfo return "direct rendering: Yes"? =====

Yes.

===== Does wired networking work? =====

Yes.

===== Does wireless networking work? =====

Yes.

===== Does the trackpad work? =====

Yes. Also, right hand side emulates a mouse scroll wheel.

===== Does sound work? =====

Line-out works. Integrated speakers work. Integrated microphone works.

Microphone-in does not work.

===== Do volume hot-keys work? =====

Yes.

===== Do brightness hot-keys work? =====

Yes.

===== Does wireless button work? =====

Yes.

===== Is cpu frequency scaling supported? =====

The output from running: `sudo invoke-rc.d powernowd restart`:

<pre>
* Stopping powernowd:                           [OK]
* Starting powernowd...                         [OK]
</pre>

===== Does integrated camera work? =====

Yes. Works with Skype, MPlayer, and Ekiga.
